data.title: High Quality and Friendly Service
data.text: This is a very nice store right on the Plaza downtown.  They have beautiful rugs, most new and some vintage.  In addition they have jewelry and decor and even sell a brand of high end bicycle.  Worth a visit when on the Plaza in Santa Fe.

data.title: Lovely store on the Plaza, beautiful and unique jewelry, rugs, accessories
data.text: Malouf's on the Plaza is a great store to find a lovely piece of unique jewelry. They also have an excellent selection of beautiful rugs. There is also an area of clothes although I didn't go in there. Quality is exceptional, salespeople are helpful and knowledgeable. They have some gorgeous pieces of sculpture as well.  Prices are in line with the quality -- Santa Fe isn't cheap!  But if you want something truly different, check here. I purchased some silver earrings in a geometric pattern and every time I wear them I get complements. This year we purchased a small alabaster buffalo made by a Navaho artist and we look forward to displaying it in our home in AZ.

data.title: A BEAUTIFUL EXPERIENCE
data.text: For anyone that wants to experience a TRUE taste of Santa Fe, make Maloufs on the Plaza your first stop! The selection of Local and National scale artists makes this store incredible!! The staff was pretty friendly and the owners make it a point to meet and greet everyone they see. They are very knowledgeable and make it a point to direct you to someone who will be knowledgable if they are not. Beautiful Rugs too!!

data.title: Something for everyone
data.text: There were so many great things in this store: Jewelry, clothing, shoes, men's clothing and accessories. There is also a rug store attached but we didn't spend a lot of time in there because we spent so much time in the other areas. Cody and Beth were extremely nice and helpful. The only downside is that all of these beautiful things come at a fairly high price. The brands they carry are pretty high end and can be expensive. The last two times I have been to Santa Fe I have found items that I could not live without and will absolutely go back the next time I am in town.

data.title: Cool, unique jewelry
data.text: Great store! Cool, unique, one-of-a-kind jewelry. Nice selection for men. I bought a sterling silver skull bolo tie and am thinking about going back for the silver and turquoise dog-tags. Best place to shop in Santa Fe.

data.title: Best jewelry selection in Santa Fe
data.text: A gorgeous store with an incredible selection of fine jewelry. Even though most of the jewelry is Native American, Malouf's carries local as well as national designers, like Armenta, Ippolita and Gurhan. My favorite place to shop when I'm in Santa Fe.
